author: Juliette Gash
title: Was the pangolin the source of the Covid-19 outbreak?
description: After two groups of coronaviruses related to Covid-19 were found in some pangolins smuggled into China, experts are wondering if trafficking of the scaly mammal was responsible for triggering the pandemic.
content:
An insightful documentary shown on RTÉ Two on Sunday night highlighted the plight of the pangolin, a shy, scaly animal found in Asia and Sub-Saharan Africa, which has the unfortunate title of the world's most trafficked mammal.
A 2016 report by animal charit… [+4119 chars]
